name: Revival Survival! - Official RRE arcade game; starring YOU!
blurb: Revival Survival - The Revival Retro Events arcade project, starring YOU!

rewards.reward: No Reward

INDIVIDUAL name in credits:\r\nYour name will appear in the credit roll as an official backer of the game for all to see! A basic reward that's handy to get your name in a game even if you never get to attend an event in person.

BUSINESS name in credits:\r\nWhether you're a small or large trader involved in the retro scene or just want to plug your private enterprise, get your name in the credit roll to show you support for retro gaming!

INDIVIDUAL background sprite:\r\nYou can actually appear in the game as a 16x16 retro-style animated character! You send us a pic and we'll create a moving likeness of you that will be worked into one of the stage or intermission screens, and appear named in the closing cast credits.

INDIVIDUAL name in credits PLUS Saturday or Sunday ticket for Revival 2014:\r\nYour name will appear in the credit roll as an official backer of the game for all to see, PLUS receive a cheaper single day ticket for Revival 2014!

INDIVIDUAL enemy character:\r\nBecome immortalised as an integral part of the gameplay as a fully-animated enemy character who tries to stop the hero reaching their goal! You will likely feature in numerous stages, with your own sound effects, as well as top of the closing enemy roll call.

6" x 4" FRAMED BEAD ART SPRITE - A unique 3" bead art sprite of any character from Revival Survival, set into a 6x4 frame in a choice of black, white or natural (subject to availability) against a branded Revival Survival backdrop with the character's name. A unique retro 3D souvenir of  your contribution to the game - your character maybe? :)

INDIVIDUAL background sprite PLUS Saturday or Sunday ticket for Revival 2014:\r\nYou can actually appear in the game as a 16x16 retro-style animated character PLUS receive a cheaper single day ticket for Revival 2014! You send us a pic and we'll create a moving likeness of you that will be worked into one of the stage or intermission screens, and appear named in the closing cast credits.

BUSINESS background sprite and banners:\r\nAppear in the game not only in person, but with your business too! If you're a show trader you could fit in nicely with a virtual store or flying the colours of your company in retro style and cement your presence as an RRE supporter! Includes listing the closing credits.

INDIVIDUAL name in credits PLUS full weekend ticket for Revival 2014:\r\nYour name will appear in the credit roll as an official backer of the game for all to see, PLUS receive a cheaper weekend ticket for Revival 2014!

INDIVIDUAL enemy character PLUS Saturday or Sunday ticket for Revival 2014:\r\nBecome immortalised as an integral part of the gameplay as a fully-animated enemy character who tries to stop the hero reaching their goal, PLUS receive a cheaper single day ticket for Revival 2014! You will likely feature in numerous stages, with your own sound effects, as well as top of the closing enemy roll call.

INDIVIDUAL background sprite PLUS full weekend ticket for Revival 2014:\r\nYou can actually appear in the game as a 16x16 retro-style animated character PLUS receive a cheaper weekend ticket for Revival 2014! You send us a pic and we'll create a moving likeness of you that will be worked into one of the stage or intermission screens, and appear named in the closing cast credits.

INDIVIDUAL enemy character PLUS full weekend ticket for Revival 2014:\r\nBecome immortalised as an integral part of the gameplay as a fully-animated enemy character who tries to stop the hero reaching their goal, PLUS receive a cheaper weekend ticket for Revival 2014! You will likely feature in numerous stages, with your own sound effects, as well as top of the closing enemy roll call.

BUSINESS intermission screen advert:\r\nHave a larger, higher-resolution picture of your company logo embedded on a compulsory intermission screen in the game. Earlier pledges will get a choice of stage placement if available. Includes listing in the closing credits.

BUSINESS company logo on cabinet artwork:\r\nHave a full-resolution company logo added to the exterior artwork of the arcade cabinet, just like the retro arcades of the past. Cabinets get filmed and photographed prominently at our events, so perfect for maximum exposure! Includes listing in closing credits.

A4 FRAMED BEAD ART SPRITE - A larger 6" bead art sprite of any character from Revival Survival, set into an A4 frame in a choice of black, white or natural (subject to availability) against a branded Revival Survival backdrop with the character's name. A more visually impressive retro 3D souvenir of  your contribution to the game - your character maybe? :)

INDIVIDUAL design-a-stage:\r\nBe the designer of an entire level in the game and choose how cool or cruel to treat the player! Specify a general layout, stage look and enemy placement. (Ideas must fit into the theme of the game for consistency)

BUSINESS advert package:\r\nIncludes both an intermission screen advert as well as cabinet artwork logo placement, saving \u00a310. Includes listing in closing credits, for maximum company exposure in-game and out!

LIMITED EDITION GOLD 'HISTORY OF OCEAN' BOOK, PLUS IN-GAME CHARACTER - RRE recently produced a definitive 'History of Ocean Software' book featuring the full story of the legendary software house and it's employees. There is a single limited edition gold-cover edition (one of only 3 made) left - grab it with this pledge, including an in-game sprite of you!

LIMITED EDITION GOLD 'HISTORY OF OCEAN' BOOK, PLUS IN-GAME CHARACTER - RRE recently produced a definitive 'History of Ocean Software' book featuring the full story of the legendary software house and it's employees. There is a final extremely limited run being made to meet the extended pre-orders and so, there will be just 3 more limited edition gold-cover edition proofs in this batch - grab one of these rare versions with this pledge (only 6 will have been made!), including an in-game sprite of you!

UNIQUE PERSONALLY SIGNED COMMODORE 64 - This collectible Commodore 64 has been signed by many of the faces of the retro gaming scene, including classic SID tune composers like Jeroen Tel! Includes UK postage and an in-game sprite of you in Revival Survival.
MOGAN & MOGAN FUNDRAISING SPONSORSHIP - PREMIUM game content design. Includes sponsorship placement, level, enemy and structure design.
